data.title: [Solved] Paris is the capital of France and is located on the River?
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

Paris is the capital of France and is located on the Seine river.

Paris is famous for art, fashion and Culture.

Seine is an important waterway in Paris basin in the north of France.

Seine is about 777 KM of length.

Gangola flows in north eastern parts of Nigeria the River and its tributaries are seasonal in nature.

Dong nai River flows through 11 provinces of Vietnam and it originated from Central highlands in South of the Vietnam.
